item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: New search engine and free-FOIA-by-fax-via-web for US veteran records (12 points | 1 comment)
2. Celebrating the Timeless Allure of Tintin's Aesthetics (64 points | 22 comments)
3. Why is my CPU usage always 100%? (206 points | 47 comments)
4. IRC Driven – modern IRC indexing site and search engine (54 points | 29 comments)
5. How did they make cars fall apart in old movies (2017) (132 points | 44 comments)
6. Raycast (YC W20) Is Hiring Full Stack Eng (EU, Remote, €105k-€160k) ( | hide)
7. Bad Apple but it's 6,500 regexes that I search for in Vim (493 points | 51 comments)
8. Show HN: JUring – Java bindings for io_uring file I/O (8 points | discuss)
9. Standard patterns in choice-based games (2015) (169 points | 42 comments)
10. The history and use of /etc./glob in early Unixes (33 points | 14 comments)

18. Bird Flu Has Spread Out of Control After Mistakes by USDA and Industry (4 points | 2 comments)
19. It's time to abandon the cargo cult metaphor (190 points | 367 comments)
20. If we had the best product engineering organization, what would it look like? (152 points | 81 comments)
21. The Canva outage: another tale of saturation and resilience (128 points | 34 comments)
22. Mac Mini G4 – The best « classic » Macintosh for retro-gaming? (201 points | 99 comments)
23. Northeastern's redesign of the CS curriculum (106 points | 106 comments)
24. The Siren Song of Little Languages (30 points | 13 comments)
25. From ASCII to ASIC: Porting donut.c to a tiny slice of silicon (127 points | 20 comments)
26. Pushing the whole company into the past on purpose (236 points | 84 comments)
27. AI Tools: Impacts on Cognitive Offloading and the Future of Critical Thinking (19 points | 7 comments)
28. DoxyPress – Modern Doxygen (17 points | 9 comments)
29. Young Persons Guide to BCPL Programming on the Raspberry Pi [pdf] (19 points | 11 comments)
